metadata.titleEn: Kilometer grid dataset of China's historical GDP spatial distribution (1990-2015)
metadata.titleCn: 中国历史GDP空间分布公里网格数据集（1990-2015）
metadata.description: Provide detailed spatial distribution of GDP data in China from 1990 to 2015 year by year. The data is 1km grid data, and the unit is 10000 yuan / square kilometer. This grid data comprehensively considers multiple factors for weight allocation to realize the spatialization of GDP, which is convenient for data sharing and spatial statistical analysis. The data comes from the resource and environment science data registration and publication system. The year-on-year data is obtained by linear interpolation of the original data, and is saved in GeoTIFF file format. The methods and standards of data over the years are consistent, the coverage is complete, and the collection and processing process is traceable and reliable.

background: With global change processes deepening, the importance of population and economic data for the interaction research of people and environment is widely recognized. However, for a long time, human geography has been based on administrative unit and physical geography has been based on natural elements unit, so, space units are not unified, which makes interaction analysis of people and environment difficult and becomes an obstacle to the progress in global change research. Spatialization of humanities data is one of the best solutions, which means spreading statistics type of humanities data over a certain size distribution of the geographic grid, in order to build up a high-resolution humanities spatial database. The characteristics of remote sensing data are wide range accessed, fast, multi-technical, quick updated and dynamic monitoring of multi-dimensional features. Spatialization statistics based on remote sensing is still on the continuous exploring and developing stage. In recent years, researchers began to explore the relationship between gross domestic product(GDP) and land use database supported by remote sensing, so as to achieve the spatial distribution of GDP.
research objective: In this study, the authors integratedly explore the correlationship between every secondary type and primary industry, secondary industry, tertiary industry. Then, utilizing linear regression analysis, an approach is carried out to the spatialization simulation of China's GDP in 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 from original county level statistical data is presented to the 1km gridded database with the standard coordinate system, data format and metadata document.
challenges: Because of many factors affecting the distribution of GDP, it is difficult to express the distribution of GDP only duing to single data source. Therefore, in order to obtain an effective, universal and high-precisive GDP model, more socio-economic data and remote sensing data should be organic united. There is still existing a huge room for improving the spatial precision of GDP, and comprehensive utilization of the means of remote sensing and GIS will become a trend to spatialization of socio-economic data.
methods: Utilizing 1:100000 scale land use database of China in 2005 based on multi-spectral remote sensing image, after comprehensive analyzing the spatial interaction of land use and GDP, the authors establish the GDP and land use spatial pattern correlation model libraries at the county level in 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, then, carry out quantitative simulation of the 1km grid economic data. In the study, the output value of agriculture, forestry, animal husbandry, fishery in primary industry correspond with farmland, woodland, grassland, waters in land use respectively; the value of secondary industry corresponds with built up area; the relationship between tertiary industry and land use is not easy to determine. Therefore, after testing and comparison repeatedly, urban, rural residential and other built up area is corresponding to tertiary industry by reason of the best correlation. It is available to derive the average value of GDP in unit area(gij) from the N sample counties of each region by least square method.
dataset: 1:100000 scale land use database of China in 2005 is interpreted by human-computer interaction by Institute of Remote Sensing Application Chinese Academy of Sciences, based on "1:100000 scale land use and land cover remote sensing mapping and classification system". Each land use type is used Environment Systems Research Institute (ESRI) 1km grid format and Asia North Albers Equal Area Conic projection, the value of certain land use types accounts for the area proportion of the grid, represented as percentage. In the study, Gross Regional Production, primary industry, secondary industry and tertiary industry statistics at national county level in 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 come from China Statistical Yearbook regional economy, additionally, the national cities and municipal districts level statistics in 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 come from China City Statistical Yearbook.
findings: GDP density map based on remote sensing could reflect the value of each pixel, eliminating the discontinuous boundary generated by average distribution of GDP. As a result, GDP density maps could reflect the GDP distribution characteristics more truly and clearly, and have great significance of drawing the national macro-economic developing plans.
backgroundCn: 随着全球变化进程的加深，人口和经济数据在研究人与环境互动中的重要性得到了广泛认可。然而，长期以来，人文地理学基于行政单位，而自然地理学则基于自然元素单位，因此空间单位并不统一，这使得人类与环境的互动分析变得困难，并成为全球变化研究进展的障碍。人文学科数据的空间化是解决这一问题的最佳方案之一，这意味着将统计类型的人文学科数据分布在一定大小的地理网格上，以建立高分辨率的人文空间数据库。遥感数据的特点是广泛获取、快速、多技术、快速更新和动态监测多维特征。基于遥感的空间化统计仍处于不断探索和发展的阶段。近年来，研究人员开始探索国内生产总值（GDP）与遥感支持的土地利用数据库之间的关系，以实现GDP的空间分布。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，作者综合探讨了每个二级产业与初级产业、二级产业和三级产业之间的相关性。然后，利用线性回归分析的方法，对中国2005年、2006年、2007年和2008年的GDP进行空间化模拟，将原始县级统计数据转化为1公里网格数据库，并提供标准坐标系统、数据格式和元数据文档。
challengesCn: 由于影响GDP分布的多种因素，仅通过单一数据源来表达GDP的分布是困难的。因此，为了获得一个有效、通用且高精度的GDP模型，需要将更多的社会经济数据和遥感数据有机结合。目前，GDP的空间精度仍然存在巨大的提升空间，综合利用遥感和GIS手段将成为社会经济数据空间化的趋势。
methodsCn: 利用基于多光谱遥感影像的2005年中国1:100000比例尺土地利用数据库，在综合分析土地利用与GDP的空间互动后，作者建立了2005、2006、2007、2008年县级GDP与土地利用空间模式相关模型库，然后对1公里网格经济数据进行定量模拟。在研究中，第一产业的农业、林业、畜牧业、渔业的产值分别对应于土地利用中的耕地、林地、草地和水域；第二产业的产值对应于建成区；而第三产业与土地利用之间的关系则不易确定。因此，在经过多次测试和比较后，城市、农村居民区及其他建成区被认为与第三产业有最佳相关性。可以通过最小二乘法从各区域的N个样本县导出单位面积的平均GDP值(gij)。
datasetCn: 2005年中国1:100000比例尺土地利用数据库由中国科学院遥感应用研究所通过人机交互进行解读，基于“1:100000比例尺土地利用和土地覆盖遥感制图与分类系统”。每种土地利用类型采用环境系统研究所（ESRI）1公里网格格式，并使用亚洲北方阿尔伯斯等面积圆锥投影，某些土地利用类型的值占网格面积比例，以百分比表示。在研究中，2005、2006、2007、2008年国家县级的地区生产总值、第一产业、第二产业和第三产业统计数据来自《中国统计年鉴·区域经济》，此外，2005、2006、2007、2008年国家城市和市辖区级的统计数据来自《中国城市统计年鉴》。
findingsCn: 基于遥感的GDP密度图可以反映每个像素的价值，消除由于GDP平均分布产生的不连续边界。因此，GDP密度图能够更真实、清晰地反映GDP分布特征，对于制定国家宏观经济发展规划具有重要意义。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that integrates socio-economic data with remote sensing to spatialize GDP distribution?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，该方法将社会经济数据与遥感相结合，以空间化GDP分布？
Example.AnswerEn: Utilizing 1:100000 scale land use database of China in 2005 based on multi-spectral remote sensing image, after comprehensive analyzing the spatial interaction of land use and GDP, researchers establish GDP and land use spatial pattern correlation model libraries at the county level, and carry out quantitative simulation of the 1km grid economic data.
Example.AnswerCn: 利用基于多光谱遥感影像的2005年中国1:100000比例尺土地利用数据库，经过对土地利用与GDP空间互动的综合分析，研究人员建立了县级GDP与土地利用空间模式相关模型库，并对1公里网格经济数据进行了定量模拟。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when attempting to create a high-precision GDP distribution model using multiple data sources?
Example.QuestionCn: 在尝试使用多个数据源创建高精度GDP分布模型时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: Because of many factors affecting the distribution of GDP, it is difficult to express the distribution of GDP only due to a single data source. Therefore, in order to obtain an effective, universal and high-precisive GDP model, more socio-economic data and remote sensing data should be organically united.
Example.AnswerCn: 由于影响GDP分布的因素众多，仅仅依靠单一数据源来表达GDP的分布是困难的。因此，为了获得一个有效的、通用的和高精度的GDP模型，需要将更多的社会经济数据和遥感数据有机结合起来。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that is used to correlate land use types with GDP in spatial distribution studies?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于在空间分布研究中将土地利用类型与GDP相关联的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: 1:100000 scale land use database of China in 2005 is used, which is interpreted by human-computer interaction by the Institute of Remote Sensing Application Chinese Academy of Sciences, based on a specific remote sensing mapping and classification system. This dataset supports creating correlation models between land use types and GDP.
Example.AnswerCn: 2005年中国1:100000比例尺土地利用数据库由中国科学院遥感应用研究所通过人机交互进行解译，基于特定的遥感制图和分类系统。该数据集支持建立土地利用类型与GDP之间的相关模型。

Feature Specification.AnswerEn: combination of socio-economic and remote sensing data, spatial precision of GDP
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 社会经济数据和遥感数据的结合，GDP的空间精度

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'spatialization of humanities data' mean in the context of geospatial datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: “人文学科数据的空间化”在地理空间数据集的背景下意味着将人文学科的数据与地理空间信息结合，以便在地图或其他地理信息系统中进行可视化和分析。这种方法可以帮助研究人员理解数据的地理分布、模式和关系，从而为人文学科的研究提供新的视角和洞察。
Definition.AnswerEn: Spatialization of humanities data refers to the process of distributing statistical humanities data across a geographic grid of a certain size to build a high-resolution humanities spatial database, facilitating interaction research between people and the environment.
Definition.AnswerCn: 人文学科数据的空间化是指将统计人文学科数据分布在一定大小的地理网格上，以构建高分辨率的人文学科空间数据库，从而促进人与环境之间的互动研究。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'GDP density map' mean in terms of geospatial data analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 'GDP密度地图'在地理空间数据分析中指的是一种可视化工具，用于展示某一地区的国内生产总值（GDP）在单位面积上的分布情况。通过这种地图，可以直观地观察到不同区域的经济活动强度和发展水平。
Definition.AnswerEn: A GDP density map is a representation of GDP data where each pixel reflects the GDP value, providing a continuous spatial distribution of economic activity. This eliminates the discontinuous boundaries typically generated by average distribution methods and allows for a clearer depiction of GDP distribution characteristics.
Definition.AnswerCn: GDP密度图是一种GDP数据的表示方式，其中每个像素反映GDP值，提供经济活动的连续空间分布。这消除了通常由平均分布方法生成的不连续边界，并允许更清晰地描绘GDP分布特征。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of spatializing GDP differ when using a single data source versus integrating multiple data sources such as socio-economic and remote sensing data?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在使用单一数据源与整合多个数据源（如社会经济数据和遥感数据）时，空间化GDP的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Using a single data source to spatialize GDP presents difficulties in accurately expressing GDP distribution due to the complexity of influencing factors. Integrating multiple data sources, including socio-economic and remote sensing data, allows for a more comprehensive and potentially higher-precision GDP model, addressing the limitations of single-source approaches.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用单一数据源来空间化GDP会面临准确表达GDP分布的困难，因为影响因素的复杂性。整合多种数据源，包括社会经济数据和遥感数据，可以构建更全面且潜在更高精度的GDP模型，从而解决单一来源方法的局限性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the relationship between GDP and land use types in the spatialization process differ across primary, secondary, and tertiary industries?
Comparison.QuestionCn: GDP与土地利用类型在空间化过程中的关系在初级、次级和三级产业之间有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In the spatialization process, the relationship between GDP and land use types varies: primary industry GDP corresponds with land use types such as farmland and grassland; secondary industry GDP corresponds with built-up areas; tertiary industry GDP is more complex and has been best correlated with urban and rural residential areas after repeated testing and comparison.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在空间化过程中，GDP与土地利用类型之间的关系有所不同：第一产业GDP与农田和草地等土地利用类型相对应；第二产业GDP与建筑用地相对应；第三产业GDP则更为复杂，经过反复测试和比较后，发现其与城镇和农村住宅区的相关性最佳。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of socio-economic and remote sensing data improve the precision of GDP spatial distribution models?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 社会经济数据与遥感数据的整合如何提高GDP空间分布模型的精确度？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: To improve the precision of GDP spatial distribution models, socio-economic data and remote sensing data should be organically united. This integration helps to address the challenges posed by the multiple factors affecting GDP distribution. The use of remote sensing data offers dynamic monitoring and wide-ranging access, which, when combined with socio-economic data, can enhance the spatialization of GDP models.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 为了提高GDP空间分布模型的精确度，社会经济数据和遥感数据应有机结合。这种整合有助于应对影响GDP分布的多重因素所带来的挑战。利用遥感数据提供动态监测和广泛的获取途径，当与社会经济数据结合时，可以增强GDP模型的空间化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways might high-resolution grid-based datasets alter the understanding of GDP distribution across regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 高分辨率网格数据集可能会以哪些方式改变对各地区GDP分布的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: High-resolution grid-based datasets provide detailed spatial distribution characteristics of GDP, eliminating the discontinuous boundaries seen in average GDP distributions. These datasets allow for a more accurate representation of GDP density, reflecting the value of each pixel. This can significantly impact the creation of national macro-economic development plans by providing a clearer and more truthful depiction of GDP distribution.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 高分辨率网格数据集提供了GDP的详细空间分布特征，消除了平均GDP分布中存在的不连续边界。这些数据集允许更准确地表示GDP密度，反映每个像素的价值。这可以显著影响国家宏观经济发展计划的制定，提供更清晰、更真实的GDP分布图景。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the difficulty of representing GDP distribution using a single data source in spatial analysis?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在空间分析中，使用单一数据源表示GDP分布的困难因素包括以下几点：
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenge arises because GDP distribution is influenced by numerous factors, making it difficult to accurately represent with just one data source. Effective spatial analysis requires the integration of diverse socio-economic data and remote sensing data to create a more precise and comprehensive GDP model.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 挑战在于GDP分布受到众多因素的影响，仅凭一个数据源很难准确表示。有效的空间分析需要整合多种社会经济数据和遥感数据，以创建更精确和全面的GDP模型。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a need for integrating remote sensing data with socio-economic data in the spatialization of GDP?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在GDP的空间化中需要将遥感数据与社会经济数据进行整合？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Integrating remote sensing data with socio-economic data is necessary because it enhances the spatial precision of GDP distribution. Remote sensing data provides wide access, fast updates, and dynamic monitoring capabilities, which help in creating a high-resolution humanities spatial database that accurately reflects GDP patterns.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 将遥感数据与社会经济数据整合是必要的，因为它增强了GDP分布的空间精度。遥感数据提供了广泛的访问、快速的更新和动态监测能力，这有助于创建一个高分辨率的人文空间数据库，准确反映GDP模式。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes challenges in establishing a correlation between tertiary industry and land use in GDP spatialization models?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在GDP空间化模型中，建立第三产业与土地利用之间的相关性面临哪些挑战？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in correlating tertiary industry with land use stem from the difficulty of identifying a direct relationship. Unlike primary and secondary industries, where connections to land use types are more straightforward, the tertiary industry requires extensive testing and comparisons to determine the best correlation with urban, rural residential, and other built-up areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 将第三产业与土地利用相关联的挑战源于识别直接关系的困难。与初级和次级产业相比，后者与土地利用类型的联系更为直接，而第三产业则需要进行广泛的测试和比较，以确定与城市、农村住宅和其他建筑区域的最佳相关性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of integrating socio-economic data and remote sensing data for improving the spatial precision of GDP models?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合社会经济数据和遥感数据以提高GDP模型空间精度的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The integration of socio-economic data and remote sensing data can lead to the development of a more effective, universal, and high-precision GDP model. It allows for a comprehensive utilization of remote sensing and GIS, which can improve the spatial precision of GDP and reflect the distribution characteristics more accurately.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 社会经济数据与遥感数据的整合可以促进更有效、普遍和高精度的GDP模型的发展。这种整合能够全面利用遥感和地理信息系统（GIS），提高GDP的空间精度，更准确地反映其分布特征。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the use of 1km grid data format impact the spatial distribution analysis of GDP over using administrative unit-based data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用1公里网格数据格式对GDP的空间分布分析的影响与使用行政单位基础数据相比如何？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using a 1km grid data format for spatial distribution analysis of GDP allows for a more detailed and continuous representation of GDP data. It eliminates the discontinuous boundaries generated by average distribution methods based on administrative units, thus providing a more accurate reflection of GDP distribution characteristics.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用1公里网格数据格式进行GDP空间分布分析，可以更详细和连续地表示GDP数据。它消除了基于行政区划的平均分布方法所产生的不连续边界，从而更准确地反映GDP分布特征。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the main objectives of integrating remote sensing data for the spatialization of GDP in China's economic data collection efforts?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 将遥感数据整合到中国经济数据收集工作中的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The main objectives include achieving a high-resolution spatial distribution of GDP by correlating it with land use data and overcoming the challenges of unified spatial units in human and physical geography, enhancing the interaction research of people and environment.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标包括通过将GDP与土地利用数据相关联，实现高分辨率的GDP空间分布，并克服人文地理和自然地理中统一空间单元的挑战，增强人类与环境的互动研究。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What drives the need for combining socio-economic and remote sensing data in the development of GDP spatial models?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 驱动将社会经济数据与遥感数据结合在一起以开发GDP空间模型的需求是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The need is driven by the complexity of factors affecting GDP distribution, which requires a comprehensive approach to enhance model precision and effectiveness, utilizing the strengths of both socio-economic data and remote sensing for a more accurate spatial representation.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 这一需求源于影响GDP分配的复杂因素，这需要一种综合方法来提高模型的精确性和有效性，利用社会经济数据和遥感的优势，以获得更准确的空间表现。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to spatialize GDP data across a geographic grid, and what are the key considerations in ensuring accuracy and reliability during this process?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于在地理网格上空间化GDP数据的程序有哪些？在确保该过程的准确性和可靠性时，有哪些关键考虑因素？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The spatialization of GDP data is achieved by integrating socio-economic data with remote sensing data, using a correlation model between land use and GDP at the county level. This involves utilizing a 1:100000 scale land use database and performing linear regression analysis to distribute GDP over a 1km grid. Key considerations include the alignment of data sources and the modeling of relationships between different industries and land use types to ensure spatial precision.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: GDP数据的空间化是通过将社会经济数据与遥感数据相结合来实现的，采用县级土地利用与GDP之间的相关模型。这涉及利用1:100000比例尺的土地利用数据库，并进行线性回归分析，以在1公里网格上分配GDP。关键考虑因素包括数据源的对齐以及不同产业与土地利用类型之间关系的建模，以确保空间精度。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is remote sensing data utilized to improve the spatial distribution accuracy of GDP, and what challenges arise during this integration process?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 遥感数据如何被利用来提高GDP的空间分布准确性，以及在这一整合过程中出现了哪些挑战。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Remote sensing data is used to map land use patterns, which are then correlated with GDP data to create a spatial distribution model. The challenges include accounting for the various factors that affect GDP distribution and integrating socio-economic data with remote sensing data to construct a high-precision GDP model. The complex relationship between land use and different industry sectors also poses a challenge, particularly in accurately representing tertiary industry.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 遥感数据用于绘制土地利用模式，然后与GDP数据相关联，以创建空间分布模型。挑战包括考虑影响GDP分布的各种因素，以及将社会经济数据与遥感数据整合，以构建高精度的GDP模型。土地利用与不同产业部门之间的复杂关系也构成了挑战，特别是在准确表示第三产业方面。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed to establish a correlation between land use types and GDP components, and how are these relationships quantified for spatial analysis?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于建立土地利用类型与GDP组成部分之间相关性的 methodologies 是什么，以及如何对这些关系进行量化以进行空间分析？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The methodology involves creating correlation model libraries at the county level, linking specific land use types to GDP components. For instance, primary industry outputs are matched to land use types like farmland and woodland, while secondary industry is linked to built-up areas. The relationship for tertiary industry is established through repeated testing and comparison, often associating it with urban and rural residential areas. Quantitative simulation of the economic data is carried out using these correlations, with least square methods applied to derive average GDP values per unit area.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该方法论涉及在县级创建相关模型库，将特定的土地利用类型与GDP组成部分联系起来。例如，初级产业产出与农田和林地等土地利用类型相匹配，而次级产业则与建成区相关联。通过反复测试和比较，建立了第三产业的关系，通常将其与城市和农村住宅区关联。利用这些相关性对经济数据进行定量模拟，并应用最小二乘法推导每单位面积的平均GDP值。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the spatialization of GDP data from administrative units to a 1km grid format?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论能够将GDP数据从行政单位空间化到1公里网格格式？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The spatialization of GDP data is enabled by integrating remote sensing data with socio-economic data. A specific approach involves using a correlation model between land use types and GDP values at the county level, supported by remote sensing images and statistical data to distribute GDP across a 1km grid.
Enablement.AnswerCn: GDP数据的空间化是通过将遥感数据与社会经济数据相结合来实现的。一种具体的方法是利用土地利用类型与县级GDP值之间的相关模型，结合遥感影像和统计数据，将GDP分配到1公里的网格上。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or factors contribute to the effective spatial distribution modeling of GDP using socio-economic and remote sensing data?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 有效的GDP空间分布建模所需的条件或因素包括社会经济数据和遥感数据。
Enablement.AnswerEn: An effective spatial distribution model of GDP requires the organic unification of socio-economic data with remote sensing data. The accuracy of such models is influenced by the availability of detailed land use databases, accurate socio-economic statistics, and the ability to establish strong correlations between GDP components and corresponding land use types.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 一个有效的GDP空间分布模型需要将社会经济数据与遥感数据有机统一。这类模型的准确性受到详细土地利用数据库、准确的社会经济统计数据的可用性以及在GDP组成部分与相应土地利用类型之间建立强相关性的能力的影响。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in precisely representing GDP distribution using a single data source?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用单一数据源精确表示GDP分布可能面临的挑战是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Because of many factors affecting the distribution of GDP, it is difficult to express the distribution of GDP only using a single data source. In order to obtain an effective, universal, and high-precisive GDP model, more socio-economic data and remote sensing data should be organically united.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于影响GDP分布的多种因素，仅使用单一数据源来表达GDP的分布是困难的。为了获得一个有效的、普遍的和高精度的GDP模型，需要将更多的社会经济数据和遥感数据有机结合起来。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is spatialization of socio-economic data anticipated to improve with the integration of remote sensing and GIS?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 空间化社会经济数据的改善预计将通过遥感和地理信息系统（GIS）的整合而实现。
Expectation.AnswerEn: The comprehensive utilization of the means of remote sensing and GIS is expected to become a trend for spatialization of socio-economic data. This is because the spatial precision of GDP can be improved by integrating these technologies, which allows for more accurate and dynamic monitoring of socio-economic variables.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 遥感和地理信息系统（GIS）手段的综合利用预计将成为社会经济数据空间化的趋势。这是因为通过整合这些技术，可以提高GDP的空间精度，从而实现对社会经济变量的更准确和动态的监测。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it expected that the GDP density map based on remote sensing could more accurately reflect GDP distribution characteristics?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么基于遥感的GDP密度地图预计能够更准确地反映GDP分布特征？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The GDP density map based on remote sensing could more accurately reflect the GDP distribution characteristics by representing the value of each pixel, eliminating the discontinuous boundary generated by average distribution of GDP. This approach offers a clearer and more authentic depiction of national macro-economic development plans.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 基于遥感的GDP密度地图可以更准确地反映GDP分布特征，通过表示每个像素的价值，消除由于GDP平均分布产生的不连续边界。这种方法提供了国家宏观经济发展规划更清晰和真实的描述。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how a dataset could achieve high spatial precision in GDP distribution using remote sensing and socio-economic data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白一个数据集如何能够通过遥感和社会经济数据实现GDP分布的高空间精度。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Achieving high spatial precision in GDP distribution involves integrating socio-economic data with remote sensing data. The approach uses the spatial pattern correlation model, which is developed by analyzing the relationship between land use types and GDP across primary, secondary, and tertiary industries. Remote sensing offers wide-ranging, quick-updating capabilities, which, when combined with socio-economic statistics, can enhance spatial precision.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 实现GDP分布的高空间精度涉及将社会经济数据与遥感数据相结合。该方法使用空间模式相关模型，通过分析土地利用类型与第一、第二和第三产业之间的关系来开发。遥感提供了广泛的、快速更新的能力，当与社会经济统计数据结合时，可以提高空间精度。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges faced in spatializing GDP data from county-level statistics to a 1km grid format.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对将县级统计的GDP数据空间化到1公里网格格式所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: One of the main challenges in spatializing GDP data is that GDP distribution is affected by numerous factors, making it difficult to represent using a single data source. Therefore, combining multiple socio-economic and remote sensing datasets is necessary. Another challenge is ensuring the spatial precision and accuracy of GDP models, which requires careful correlation analysis and modeling of land use types against economic outputs.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 空间化GDP数据的主要挑战之一是GDP分布受到众多因素的影响，因此很难仅通过单一数据源进行表示。因此，有必要结合多个社会经济和遥感数据集。另一个挑战是确保GDP模型的空间精度和准确性，这需要对土地利用类型与经济产出进行仔细的相关性分析和建模。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand what data collection methods are involved in generating a spatially distributed GDP dataset.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白生成空间分布GDP数据集涉及哪些数据收集方法。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data collection methods for generating a spatially distributed GDP dataset include using a 1:100000 scale land use database interpreted with remote sensing images. The output values of different industries are correlated with specific land use types, and statistical data from national and regional sources are used for county-level analysis. This combination allows for the creation of a high-resolution 1km grid GDP dataset.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 生成空间分布GDP数据集的数据收集方法包括使用1:100000比例尺的土地利用数据库，并结合遥感影像进行解读。不同产业的产出值与特定的土地利用类型相关联，同时使用国家和地区来源的统计数据进行县级分析。这种结合方法使得能够创建高分辨率的1公里网格GDP数据集。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the methodologies used in the spatialization simulation of GDP data and explain how these methods address the challenges associated with GDP distribution modeling.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于GDP数据空间化模拟的方法论，并解释这些方法如何解决与GDP分布建模相关的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methodologies used involve integrating county-level statistical data with a 1:100000 scale land use database, interpreted using multi-spectral remote sensing images. A correlation model is established between GDP and land use patterns at the county level. The simulation involves quantitative modeling of GDP distribution at a 1km grid scale, utilizing regression analysis to derive GDP values per unit area. This approach addresses challenges by incorporating socio-economic data with remote sensing data, enhancing spatial precision.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 所使用的方法涉及将县级统计数据与1:100000比例尺的土地利用数据库相结合，并利用多光谱遥感图像进行解读。在县级建立了GDP与土地利用模式之间的相关模型。该模拟涉及在1公里网格尺度上对GDP分布进行定量建模，利用回归分析推导每单位面积的GDP值。这种方法通过将社会经济数据与遥感数据相结合，增强了空间精度，从而解决了挑战。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the challenges faced in achieving high spatial precision in GDP modeling and suggest strategies that might be employed to overcome these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 概述在实现GDP建模的高空间精度时面临的挑战，并建议可以采用的策略来克服这些挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include the difficulty of expressing GDP distribution using a single data source due to multiple influencing factors. To overcome this, the integration of socio-economic data with remote sensing data is suggested. Comprehensive utilization of remote sensing and GIS techniques could improve spatial precision and facilitate the spatialization of socio-economic data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于多个影响因素，使用单一数据源表达GDP分配的困难。为了解决这个问题，建议将社会经济数据与遥感数据进行整合。全面利用遥感和GIS技术可以提高空间精度，并促进社会经济数据的空间化。
